001Q1.question: The first question I feal like I should ask for the sake of this text adventure is do you have autism? (Y or N)

001Q2.question: Now that we have gotten to know you a bit more lets get to makeing a friend shal we. You are in class alone you look over to see a some what cool looking dude named jack what do you do?

002Q2.question: You should proberbly go talk to him

001Q3.question: (tip you should as jack his intrests) what do you do?

003Q4.question: You tell jack your intrested in pokemon so you to decide to do a pokemon battle your level 5 rowlet against his level 5 eevee what do you do

003Q5.question: Its a critical hit ending the battle. Jack thinks the battle was fun and is now ready to be friended what do you do?

001QEnd.question: Good Job you have made friends with jack (press enter to restart)
